text: agar tum achchhe kaam karoge to apane phaayade ke lie achchhe kaam karoge aur agar tum bure kaam karoge to (bhee) apane hee lie phir jab doosare vakt qa vaayada aa pahuncha to (hamane taitoos rogee ko tum par musallat kiya) taaki vah log (maarate maarate) tumhaare chehare bigaad den (ki pahachaane na jao) aur jis tarah pahalee dapha masjid baitul muqaddas mein ghus gaye the usee tarah phir ghus paden aur jis cheez par qaaboo pae khoob achchhee tarah barabaad kar dee
